amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to insert the budget proposal endorsed by the Simpson-Bowles Commission.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute numbered 3 printed in House Report 112-423 to utilize Simpson-Bowles recommendations for establishment of the budget for FY 2013 and to set forth the appropriate budgetary levels for FY 2014 through FY 2022.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cooper amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 38 - 382, 2 Present (Roll no. 145).

action.text: Amendment (A003) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Cooper.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Cooper.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cooper amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 38 - 382, 2 Present (Roll no. 145).
